website_summaries.verdict: Babies are mesmerized by this interactive peek-a-boo toy, which holds up well to hugs.
pros: A hit with babies and their parents
Peek-a-boo ears fascinate younger kids and hold up to light play
Singing sounds clear and realistic through the toy’s speaker
cons: Battery cover could use more velcro for a stronger close
Only sings one song – over and over

customer_reviews.title: Totally adorable!  Grand loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our newest grand absolutely loves to play Peek-A-Boo! So when I saw this, I just had to get it. She LOVES it! He is even more cute in person than on here, and his fur is very soft and cuddly. Very well made! I am now going to get another as a baby gift!
customer_reviews.author: Teddie Gray

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My adult daughter suffered a TBI 7 years ago. She is now a child. Mia is only 4'10", tiny and cute. She always loved elephants. When I saw this, I thought she would enjoy. I could not wait until Christmas! I had no idea just how she would respond. It was so moving, I cried! She began to play peek a boo and giggled with glee! This is a wonderful toy, so cute, soft and sweet. I would imagine any child would share in my daughters reaction! If you're reading this, please offer a good thought or prayer for Mia. Thank you, God bless you.
customer_reviews.author: mchiara

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute gift for little kids. My little girl is 12 weeks old and she loves this little bunny. It keeps her engaged and seems to be fun. I love the cute ear movements and it's voice. It's perfect for a little one because it's actually sung by a child and not too annoying as it is with most "talking" toys. Great quality as well. Plus, it comes with a battery, which is a definite plus!
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Hey Baby!
customer_reviews.text: One of the cutest toys I have bought. Purchased for granddaughter and she loves it! Her Mom always says, "hey, baby" to her so it amazed her. She loves the ears moving. This is second product review I have sent. Grandbaby plays with this all of the time and she loves it! It is also holding up nicely. She likes to put her face between the ears while it is playing.The most favorite toy I have bought in a very long time. It is so sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double your smiles!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely darling! My granddaughter's face lights up every time we play it for her! And, I love that you have TWO songs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will stop working randomly and never come back
customer_reviews.text: Bought January 2nd 2019. Stopped working a few days ago just 1 month after return window closed. Changed the batteries, never dropped it, and barely even used more than a handful of times. I’ve had holiday decorations last longer and better built than this children’s toy...
customer_reviews.author: Barry Kucher

customer_reviews.title: Captivates our Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Very cute!. Each of the two songs/dialogues lasts about a minute and the ears flap hilariously in sync with the sound. Our granddaughter and several other babies have been enthralled with it. Makes me laugh every time too!
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Awsome ********
customer_reviews.text: You will not believe what this bunny does, flips the ears and sings peak a boo, talks to the child with numerous phrases amazing gift for tiny child 4 month old+, sings lots of things and is so soft. Bought this because of the name but was a huge hit with child and parents receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Foley

customer_reviews.title: Only toy allowed in the crib
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter in Canada. I found out later that this is the only toy my daughter feels safe leaving in the crib with my granddaughter while she sleeps. Warm fuzzies.
customer_reviews.author: Tillo Family

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged very well. No odors or smell on elephant. Battery compartment is hidden with fabric and also has 4 small screws to open up. The price was a little high, but it is a Gund. The music and talking is very clear in the American language . Ears flap very well. Came with 3 starter batteries which I will replace .I think a 1 year old wont know how to operate the foot to start singing and flapping of ears, but the adult will. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product from Gund. They never disappoint me. I’m so excited to gift these to my two baby nieces for Christmas. I bought a bunny and an elephant. Both are absolutely adorable. The only thing that I have to nitpick on is how loud it is. I really wish they had a included a way to control the volume. Other than that I highly recommend it. Your little one won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mvang_00

customer_reviews.title: Quit working before six months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my niece for Christmas, and she was in love! Then about a month ago (late April) and it has quit working. The batteries have been changed and changed and changed. I am hoping by leaving this review the company will do something to help my niece out. I am frustrated because it isn't even six months old and she LOVED this toy. Please help. If the toy worked I would hands down give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hartzfeld

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure who enjoyed this toy more, our granddaughter Maddie or the rest of the family! The sound quality is excellent and the flapping ears are very entertaining. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Peek A Boo Baby
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES this bunny. He also has Flappy the Elephant. It’s not inexpensive, but it is worth every dollar when I see how it intrigues and delights the baby. I have given several to other new babies, and every single parent raves about this Gund product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and couldn't wait to show it to my granddaughter. I'm not even sure if this was new or not. It was just thrown loose in a beat up cardboard box with no packaging or lining to protect it. Then when I tried to open the battery compartment the screw had been reamed out and I was unable to get the screw out . I would have to break the plastic door to find out if this thing even works. Don't waste your time or money. This goes back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hood

customer_reviews.title: Cutest thing EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This rabbit has to be the cutest thing I've ever seen for a baby gift! Its so well made but GUND is the best of the best when it comes to stuffed toys. They have been around for 100 years and this is why. Its so easy to use and batteries came with it. She sings and plays Peek-a-boo with the cutest voice. The Price is amazing as well. Thanks Gund....youve done it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Elizabeth Bopp

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cute elephant for my granddaughter's birthday, knowing that she'd love it. When her birthday rolled around, I took the elephant out of the box to see what it could do. When the animation and sound didn't work, I figured it was the cheap batteries that came with it. As others have noted, it took me at least 20 minutes to get the battery door open. I changed the batteries, and the toy was still dead. By now it's past the window to return it, so I'm stuck with it. I won't even give it away, because I don't want another child to be disappointed. Gund, this item is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kathyngs

customer_reviews.title: Not Only Is He Soft & Cuddly, But He Sings, Talks, Moves & Wants To Be Your Buddy!
customer_reviews.text: Oh come on! A singing elephant that flaps its ears and covers its eyes with its ears and plays 'peekaboo'! Can it get any cuter than that?!! God no! This stupid stuffy is so stinking cute! It's worth every penny! Who the heck thinks of these things?! Genius! This adorable singing elephant puts the biggest smile on my daughter's face and she never gets sick of it. Bonus... just because it's mechanical, doesn't mean it's stiff like 99% of mechanical toys; this Gund product is a loving huggable, curls up in bed, friendly elephant!
customer_reviews.author: Cole & Allie's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun for babies 12 plus
customer_reviews.text: The toy is absolutely cute But even though the sound it makes and the flapping ears are gentle some babies are frightened by it. I bought it for my 11 month old niece and she was afraid of it. I'm sure she will enjoy it in 2-3 months or so. I think it's not for every baby. Not for a baby whose only a few months old but having said that it's a really wonderful, fun toy
customer_reviews.author: Agno

customer_reviews.title: This is so adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! This is so adorable!!!! SO adorable! My niece loves it and it's going to be my new baby shower gift from now on! Also, I ordered 3 and even though they were not in stock and were not suppose to arrive until March 13th, they got in stock much sooner. I ordered one for my grandson because he's been hospitalized for a week now and it's been pretty serious. He is not even 1 yet. His elephant arrived today and his daddy is taking it to the hospital to cheer him up. SO Thankful for this lil elephant!!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Watts

customer_reviews.title: You will win the best gift ever award with this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1yr old niece and when she pulled it out of the bag she hugged it. When I said "hit the play button" and it played peekaboo she laughed and gave it a big kiss. Then when it sang "Do your ears hang low" She flipped out hugged it tight as tight could be and laughed. You will definitely win the birthday/Christmas/whatever you are celebrating party with this. I wouldn't recommend this for a baby shower though. It's definitely better when the kid understands how to push buttons and hold things for their self. Even mommy loved this! (and it makes noise so you know its great when mommy loves a noise making toy)
customer_reviews.author: ambiebear

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product at the end of January. My baby loved it! But after 1 month it stopped working. We thought it needed new batteries so we opened the compartment to put new batteries in but it still did not work even with new batteries :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived DIRTY
customer_reviews.text: Flappy arrived dirty straight out of the box. Not even in plastic. Has dirt all over it. Returning it and getting a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Flappy makes my son so happy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old son loves Flappy. When selecting a gift for his Grandpa to get him, we chose this, then returned it to get an infant gym instead. When the price dropped, I decided to pick it up on a whim, so that he can “grow into it”, as I thought I liked it more than he would. Surprise, surprise.... Flappy lights my boy’s face up like no other toy. My only wish is that there were more than 2 songs. Even if I had to pay more! But with that said, Flappy is still the favorite, hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of this items and BOTH stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product is counterfeit. I bought the first Gund when still pregnant and when baby was about 2 months it wouldn't work. The second one I got when he was about 5 months old and again stopped working just as the return window had closed. Needless to say baby didn't even play with toy as he didnt know how to push the button, so it was only handled by adults. Now I am left with two useless overpriced stuffed animals. Got one at buy buy baby and it works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Item defective!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this bear for my daughter. I was really dissapointed when it came and the ears didn’t work. They only made noise with almost no movement.(even after putting new batteries in) Will be returning it!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bunny for our granddaughter for Christmas this year. We knew it would be great as we purchased it’s cousin~the plush singing elephant for our grandson a few years ago. These plus toys are beautiful looking, soft, safe. And, the voice coming from them in speech & singing is pleasant compared to so many babies/toddlers toys. And so very well done. I would recommend this rabbit to anyone, a perfect shower gift. And, a perfect toy for a baby under a year old with adult supervision.
customer_reviews.author: RestlessHeartTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: i LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: my husband bought this for me for my birthday...and i'm in my sixties. i LOVE it!!!! i'm a fan of elephants to begin with and this one is just precious!! soft as can be, very cute and appealing voice and my little grandchildren are in such awe of it. my one of my daughter's said it is the cutest musical action toy she had seen and she's always looking for her child. well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: yaya

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few weeks before breaking
customer_reviews.text: i loves this and so did my daughter. She was 2 months old when i got it for her and would just watch it with intent as it’s ears flopped around. After only a few weeks the ears stopped working :( She was too little to play with it so it’s not broken from her being too rough with it, it just wasn’t good quality. Sad too, bc she really loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Leighanne55

customer_reviews.title: good toy for kid
customer_reviews.text: perfect – perfection, positive energy, positive thoughts, positive events, positive circumstances, positive beliefs, peace – pacify, paradise – paradisiac, passion – passionate, please, pure, perceptiveness, perseverance, persistence, personal growth, pleasure, positive attitude, positive words, power – powerful, practicality, precision, preparedness, presence, preservation, privacy, proactivity – proactive, progress, prosperity prosperous, punctuality – punctual, patience, it is indeed a bit
customer_reviews.author: DEREK

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality!!! not sure is if safe to give to a baby, (1) The mechanical ear make awful noise. (2) The toy come out directly from a brown box. so no plastic bag and come dirty doubt about its come with a certification for baby products and toys.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Lau

customer_reviews.title: It was defective, never worked but very cute and plush. So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is defective. I even changed the batteries and nothing. I am very disappointed because it is adorable and so soft. I would like a replacement in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped unwrapped in a shipping box! There is no volume control so it’s very loud. The information listed says the elephant does two things, sings and peek-a-boo which are both very short so you have to keep pressing the feet every few seconds! Based on all the great reviews I expected better than this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: princessdjwm

customer_reviews.title: Great, soft, cute, and totally giftable elephant!
customer_reviews.text: My son love this ! He is just now sitting up decent and loves to try and grab it while play games and singing to him. Super soft material, only reason i gave a 4 star on durability is because my son like to grab it by the ears and they are pretty flimsy also it doesn’t seem like it can be washed so I have to keep it away from my teething baby who just wants to eat it while watching it. But this little elephant is the cutest little thing ever !
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Stops working in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product if it actually lasted. We bought this a few months before our son was born. He is now 7 months and has only been using the elephant for about 4 months and the ears just stopped working. It’s very unfortunate because he loved this toy. Being a 40$ toy, this is not the quality I was expecting. We even replaced batteries but still not working. Now we are stuck with a toy that doesn’t work and aren’t able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Perez

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my registry and imagine that no one got it because of the price and not realizing what it can do. I purchased it myself as part of the completion discount from my registry because I think my son will really enjoy it. It’s absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: My 7 month olds reaction to this toy was priceless
customer_reviews.text: I think this was my favorite purchase this Christmas! I bought it for my 7 month old because it had good reviews. I wasn’t expecting her to care much because her interest in toys has been minimal. But her reaction to this toy was priceless! She laughed and cooed and danced (she hadn’t danced on her own up until this point). It was very sweet, and she still loves it. I highly recommend this toy for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: What a fun toy!! We almost kept it instead of giving it to our great-granddaughter. :-)
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a Gund bunny for our great-grandaughter's first birthday. This was on a flash deal so we got it. When it arrived, we turned it on. It played songs and the ears moved to the music. It is sooooo cute. Anyway, we gave in and gave it to her. She was equally delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Don S

customer_reviews.title: No value
customer_reviews.text: VERY VERY disappointed with this Gund product. It’s not as soft as I thought it would be nor as large. I can remember getting a Gund stuffed animal was a big deal. What happened? Too late to get something else as it’s a baby gift. Glad I bought other items to go with so I won’t be embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super cute elephant with nice child voice (singing & peek a boo)
customer_reviews.author: SSG

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for a young child.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January 2020 for an upcoming Easter basket. I buy in advance to evaluate. This is a very good choice for a young child for either Easter or a child's birthday. Amazon Prime delivered fast, so it can be ordered relatively late if it is in stock. Press the left foot an it plays peek-a-boo. Press the right foot and it plays "Do your ears hang low" with flapping ears. Sound quality is good. For a younger child, either boy or girl.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Camfield

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy but I wanted to love it.... 3am newborn is swaddled and sleeping, I’m sleeping.... and all of a sudden, like out of a horror story this toy starts singing “I see you, I see you, flip flop” pitch dark I got up. I had to review my videos to actually believe what just happened. This toy was completely off and started working on its own in the middle of the night! Baby was no where near the toy and completely swaddled, there is no explanation to why it started singing on its own next to the baby while it was OFF mode. Defective? Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Euroar

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves Flora - Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of this toy. Flora does her dance and plays peek-a-boo quite well. My infant son really loves it and focuses on her when she is singing or playing peek-a-boo. We actually ordered a second one to give to my sister-in-law who is pregnant. Great gift. Great toy. My only wish is that there is a cycle of songs that it plays instead of just the one. If it was three songs, I think it would be even better and an instant classic. If you can pick it up on sale, it is highly worth it. Made in China
customer_reviews.author: Sunny & Tony

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: As soon I saw this at Nordstrom I fell in love with this but it was too pricey. Luckily on amazon prime day it was on sale for half price. This is very cute and the material is so soft too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Loveable!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bunny for my 7 month old son. He laughs and giggles when the bunny plays peek a boo. But it gets kind of annoying when I constantly have to press the button on the bottom of the bunny’s feet to activate the peek a boo or singing part of the bunny. Probably would be better if my son was old enough to press it himself or has a setting where it constantly plays on its own instead of me physically being there to do that. Other than that, the bunny is very soft and cute. It does come with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: The cutest Gund I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Best money I ever spent. This is the baby gift I have purchased for my new granddaughter that is not yet born. I have always loved the quality of Gund animals and bought them for my own kidswhen they were young. My daughter loves elephants and when I saw this one talked I went ahead and purchased it without having seen it in person first. The Elephant alone is beyond adorable but when you press one foot and it plays peekaboo and the other foot sings a song With both ears interactively moving, I nearly cried it was so adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Julie N

customer_reviews.title: Best plush elephant ever! Plays peek a boo!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this adorable toy! It’s so soft and plush. I have purchased 3 so far, 2 for gifts. What makes this elephant so special is the fact that you can push a button on its foot, and plays peek a boo by voice and by flopping it’s ears over its face, saying “where am I”, then the ears come up and it says “here I am”.. So often voices on toys are annoying, but this elephant has a child like voice that is just right. It is made by Gund so you can expect a very long life .
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any little one!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with this purchase. It is soft and adorable. I did my research before purchasing and although others appeared the same, I chose the Grund version based on two things: #1 The other ones voices seemed creepy and muffled to me. #2 The other versions had a different second verse that was odd and not completely child appropriate. When I made this purchase I was still skeptical but once it arrived, I was pleasantly surprised and couldn't wait to give it to my niece. Her laughter says it all. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Within a few weeks of my 5 month old playing with (ie me pushing the button for him to watch) the ears stopped working and it makes a horrible machine noise.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth getting!!!!  ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: LOOOOOOVE THIS. Definitely worth the money. It’s super soft and very cute and I love how it comes ready to use without putting your own batteries in it at first. So helpful because I wanted to use it straight out of the box when my baby was being fussy and I was able to and that was such a plus. I love how soft this is and you can’t hear the inside parts either which is nice. Great sound. I will be buying another one that’s for sure
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I purchased this for our 6 month old grandson and I'm not sure I can part with it. It is so darn cute and the voice is so sweet. Easy to operate, just remove the tape from battery by pulling, turn it on and press the bottom of a foot. What youngchild would not love such a cute sweet toy? Sorry, I couldn't get my video to download.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dead batteries. Unable to unscrew the battery cover.
customer_reviews.text: I pulled the battery tab and the batteries are DEAD. Tried to unscrew the battery cover and the small screw will NOT budge. I am using the right size screwdriver and it's almost stripped.... beyond frustrating. Going to return.
customer_reviews.author: ODL

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!! keeps your baby happy!
customer_reviews.text: I found this elephant on lightening deal and it had great reviews. I decided to get it for my newborn and she loves it. I use it for when I change her diaper. it sings a song and also plays hide and seek. It's ears come down over its eyes and then back to normal. It is very cute and babies love it! It is a decent size as well.
customer_reviews.author: House OF Yorkies

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for our 6 month old grand daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is a hit with our new grand daughter - but be warned - you will likely fall into one of two camps... Either (1) you will find yourself humming and/or singing "do your ears hang low" at odd moments throughout the day, eternally taken by the cuteness of the whole thing - or (2) you will think it is cute at first and then secretly want to either punt it over the fence -or- see how long it carries on after you drop it in the pool - every time you hear the someone else humming or singing the song.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about gifting this toy.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute ... very soft .... nice voice sound... Came in plain box as if it was a used bear... at first I thought i bought an incorrect used toy giving the way it was not at all packaged or tagged .... this is suppose to be a gift for Christmas....but now deciding if i should send it back and get something else....after all i spent good amount of money and it doesn’t reflect that at all.... i also question what the durability will be after a drop or two....undecided
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but won't last long
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift for newborn baby. One of the two feet stopped working in two months after infrequent use by adults-- no kids were around to abuse the buttons! The Bunny ears flop adorably as it tells the baby "hello baby! Peekaboo, I see you! Peekaboo is most fun with you" but the song (first verse of "do your ears hang low") a little antiquated and the lyrics questionable for a children's toy.. but that's my personal choice, not a major issue with the toy.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Scared My 9 month old!
customer_reviews.text: This elephant is ADORABLE. Beyond cute, and super soft. My 9 month old daughter loves peekaboo, so I thought this would be a much loved Christmas present! But afraid she saw something the 2100+ other reviewer's babies did not?! She was find looking at it, and also find when it sang. But when those ears started flapping, the tears began to flow. I tried to introduce it to her a few times over a few days. No go. Cried every time! We will be returning those - which makes ME sad! It is so darn cute.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Cute, soft elephant for a toddler that loves elephants
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute toy for a baby/toddler. My niece loves elephants and her room is decorated in gray and pink with elephants, so this was a gift for her. When she was younger (under 1 year), the flapping ears and sounds scared her a little, but now that she is almost 18 months old, she loves playing with this toy. It seems to have held up well, but that is not surprising as Gund brand makes good products. The price from this seller was also very fair, and was lower than some other big brand stores that I found in my area. Overall, I would definitely recommend this toy for a young toddler!
customer_reviews.author: BrownEyedGirl87

customer_reviews.title: Was not a new item
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my niece when it arrived it didn't work. It obviously wasn't new. The battery protective strip was not there and the on off switch was in the on position. I tried putting new batteries in and it still didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Most Lovable Dumbo
customer_reviews.text: This would be the sweetest dumbo your child would have experienced. My Baby is loving it. We had disney dumbo but after buying this, she started playing with this. The Elephant teddy is very soft and is ideal for the babies between 8 months - 2 1/2 years. THis elephant plush toy would speak few words and sings a song. My Baby started singing song and telling the same words. So this toy would actually improve speaking skills for the baby. It would have been great if this toy is made of mixed colors.
customer_reviews.author: AMBA

customer_reviews.title: Like the toy but arrived a little dirty and sound was not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little toy money last week. I usually like this brand of toys and we already have the Falppy elephant toy for the little one but not entirely happy with this one. It arrived in a box with no plastic or anything else to protect it so we started cleaning it but when we cleaned it we noticed a good amount of dust/dirt on it. Also the sound was a little lower than expected. Not entirely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Ears do not move as described. Very UPSET!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order. This was supposed to be a Christmas gift for my 6 month old, and the ears DO NOT MOVE. I would like a refund ASAP. It is two days before Christmas, and now it has been ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: baby gund floral
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would have came wrapped in plastic it was just thrown in a carton and it being white it did not seem white white especially for a child . it did work and it was cute .
customer_reviews.author: Dwyanne Jones

customer_reviews.title: I’ve received a defective product and I’m 1 1/2 weeks past my return window
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons favorite toy. He’s been inseparable from his elephant for almost a year. I ordered this bunny for him because his elephants ears no longer work and only one side plays music. I’ve had the bunny for less than 1 1/2 months and it no longer works. After replacing the batteries it doesn’t turn on anymore. I’ve now missed my return window. Is it possible to get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Padilla

customer_reviews.title: My daughter adores this stuffed animal. She loves both ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter adores this stuffed animal. She loves both the peek-a-boo and song that it sings. She likes to grab it's ears while they're flapping and chew on them. This stuffed animal is so cute and entertaining! Edit: A year later and this is still a favorite toy! I would highly recommend as we've gotten a lot of love out of this little elephant. It's also the best price year round compared to in store. Finally, the elephant has withstood a LOT of abuse. My daughter loves to carry the elephant around by the ears or will grab them will they're flopping, and the elephant still sings and moves as if it were brand new.
customer_reviews.author: EmaebeTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for new baby
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a newborn who had elephant themed room. It’s not the typical (in my mind anyway) plush and huggable Gund toy. But, it sings and has flapping ears and became the baby’s first toy of interest when she was several weeks old. I’m find another, more huggable Gund toy for her as she goes through her stages but, quite accidentally, this little singing elephant is perfect for babies just becoming aware of their new world.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Love him not annoyed yet
customer_reviews.text: My four-month-old loves this elephant I thought he would get bored but it still occupies him two months later the first one I received had issues stay with it. It would not play the music room in the butt and was touch luckily Amazon returned it for a new one and the new one has had no issues. We love our flappy the elephant
customer_reviews.author: suraya

customer_reviews.title: So loved 😍
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is loved by our 3 granddaughters. First time we saw him, he was a gift to our twin granddaughters when they were too little to appreciate him - yet. But we thought he was so cute, that we bought him for our older granddaughter, who was maybe 10 months at the time. She LOVED him. Gave him kisses. Carried him around by his ears... so cute! So we bought one for the twins. NOW, they love him too! We highly recommend this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle51

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it, wished I bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I actually saw this first at BuyBuyBaby. My toddler would not let me leave the area. She kept asking me to push the button over. The elephant ears will close on its eyes and play peek-a-boo. And also moves along some songs it sings. I read some reviews that you ended up getting fake versions or other regular stuffed elephants. I ordered this Feb. 2018, just got the shipment and checked. It seems authentic and it came with the tag and everything.
customer_reviews.author: SuziTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My son loves!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 7 months old and loves this elephant! Personally it's my go to when hes overly tired...He's fascinated with the peek a boo ears and since hes teething he likes to try and bite them lol I will say this tho although the song is meant to be playful the words are bit odd if you pay overly attention to them..still would recommend Another small gripe I paid 30 bucks for grundy and hes now cheaper I believe you can him for 24 bucks now so I personally think I paid too much! But..cant put a price on a sleepy baby
customer_reviews.author: Rachael M

customer_reviews.title: Cute, soft, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I found this originally at Macy’s and fell in love. It’s a perfect gift for babies. It is SO SO SO soft! I ended up buying three for my friends that recently had a baby. It was a great gift. Not only is it huggable, but it plays peekaboo with you and sings a cute song! It’s honestly just the perfect gift and worth every penny. The parents loved it equally as much! (Which is good cause no parent wants a toy with an annoying noise lol)
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old granddaughter. When I saw it in a hospital gift shop, I had to have it. Purchased it on Amazon. It's a bit pricy, but well worth it. It is very well made. My granddaughter has carried it around and tossed it around, and it still works perfectly. It plays "Do Your Ears Hang Low?", and it also plays Peek-a-Boo with its large ears! Just too cute! Loved it so much I bought one for my friend's grandchild too. I highly recommend this stuffed Elephant.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Hollobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, lovable and kills lots of time
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the 1st birthday of our daughter. And it becomes one of her favorite toys! At first she seems to be a little bit nervous about the moving ears, then she enjoys pushing the button and holds the bunny in her hands for long time. It’s just so lovable to see her hugs and kisses and smiles with the bunny. It is worth the money and we bought it when it was a deal price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T

customer_reviews.title: Peek-a-boo, I found you!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute toy and idea. The elephant is super soft and the toy itself is very versatile- option to play peek-a-boo or sing along to a song. My little one enjoys watching it in action and the floppy ear animations are great! Was definitely impressed with this toy and would definitely recommend it for your little one or to give as a gift. It is definitely a little steeper pricewise for a stuffed animal/toy, but I think can still be considered worth the money since it is very engaging.
customer_reviews.author: JRS305

customer_reviews.title: The cutest most adorable singing elephant!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little elephant! I had found one at another store but they were selling it for $40, but I had to have him because he was so adorable! Found it on Amazon for much cheaper and I’m so glad they had it! He is so soft and his singing and ear flapping is too precious! I’m expecting a baby the nursery is safari themed, so this little elephant is the perfect, sweetest addition.
customer_reviews.author: Katj

customer_reviews.title: Oh My Cuteness!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grandson and was able to test it out prior to wrapping/shipping the item. Seriously the cutest thing ever and the sweet little "sing song" voice is absolutely adorable! I don't doubt for a moment that a young child wouldn't be amused over watching this litlte feller...too cute! It arrived neatly packaged and with batteries installed. There's a pull tab to activate it, which was easily replaceable by opening the battery compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnie

customer_reviews.title: cute singing toy
customer_reviews.text: this is a toy that sings the "do your ears hang low" song and plays "peek a boo" with you. Its really cute and soft but there is a motor in the bottom of the doll so the bottom is hard. theres a flap so you can turn on/off and change batteries when needed. the ears move with the song and game which catches the eye of my baby. would recommend to those wanting a singing toy. because of the motor, it sits up right which is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: min2be

customer_reviews.title: Sent defective item originally... replacement was perfect
customer_reviews.text: The original product I received was defective and one of ears didn’t work properly. I called for a replacement... and replacement was perfect in all ways. It looked like the original sent item was someone’s return, or used... as it did not have the original tags like the replacement did Gave 5 stars to replacement because it works perfectly. 2 stars to the original because of the defect.
customer_reviews.author: camille superson

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think I love this toy elephant as much as my granddaughter!! It has two games, peek a boo or sing does your ears hang low song. Easy push buttons on the feet to play. Movement of elephant ears to play with the child. It is so adorable! I will definitely make this a shower gift for new moms in the future. Every time we push the button so the elephant starts to play my granddaughter smiles!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Flappy!! gets Baby's attention!
customer_reviews.text: I got this ADORABLE Singing Elephant for my Great Granddaughter. As far as I can tell, she loves it! I know I do! It is adorable! It makes a perfect gift for the little one in your life! Soft fur, childlike voice, gets the little ones attention with the voice and flipping ears! Just too darn cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is fascinated with clapping his hands. He just turned one and ehen I saw Clappy, I had to get it. (I previously bought him Flappy, the perk a boo elephant.) This cute monkey claps it's hands and sings "If you're happy and you know it." Adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Hill

customer_reviews.title: Quit working. Cute but not quality.
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this, great toy...when it worked. It was super fun and they adored it until it quit working 10 days after the manufacturers 90day warranty. Too expensive for such a short lifespan. Very disappointed. And btw...this is the second one that died, we had the bunny version too that quit working in the same manner. Cute but not quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So sweet and entertaining for a 1 and 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: This little elephant’s voice is so sweet! It sounds just like a little kid playing peek-a-boo and singing songs. My 15-month-old niece was completely mesmerized and cuddled her elephant each time he sang and played with her. For not much money, this little toy has already brought hours of enjoyment. I was pleasantly surprised that her older brother (4 years old) also found the elephant charming and watches her play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Fansatic
customer_reviews.text: So glad I decided on buying the 'Baby GUND Animated Flappy the Elephant Stuffed Animal Plush'. There are plenty of cheaper knockoffs being offered but nothing compares to the absolute quality of this product. I promise you will not be disappointed. What turned out to be an added bonus was, being completely surprised to receive it the day after placing my order. Do it, just do it.
customer_reviews.author: James L Jones

customer_reviews.title: The cutest thing!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a shower gift for my grandson! She is absolutely darling - sings in a clear, female voice and flips her ears when she sings - and the songs are original and fit her perfectly. You can't help but smile when you listen to her and watch her movements! When he is a little older and can track better with his eyes, he will love watching her and hearing her sing!
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated Mom

customer_reviews.title: No tags
customer_reviews.text: This bunny came placed in an Amazon box with no tags and no original packaging. Buyer beware. If you are going to give it as a gift it may or may not come in an acceptable fashion. Trying to make people aware and still follow Amazon guide lines because this is the second time writing this. Hope this one is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: This bunny is amazing. I gave it to my 4 month old for east and every week he enjoys it more and more. The volume is just the right volume and the songs and games are adorable. The voice is a cute soft and sweet voice for a baby. I will be getting this for friends in the future because I just cant get enough of it!
customer_reviews.author: Shellye

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and the song is adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely adorable! The voice is very sweet and the elephant ears flapping while it sings are to die for. My 4mo little girl loves her "Lele" (that's how we nicknamed it) and does little screams of joy when we set it on singing. She doesn't really get peekaboo yet, so not much reaction to that. It's also very soft, so she loves to squeeze the legs and grab the ears. I'd definitely recommend as a baby shower gift, or as a baby gift in general.
customer_reviews.author: LP Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Animated Bunny with Big Floppy Ears
customer_reviews.text: Our one year old grandson adores his animated, oh so cute Bunny and gets very excited when the cuddly Bunny sings and moves his big floppy ears up and down. The mechanisms for the ears and the audio have continued to work perfectly despite being handled every which way. This stuffed animal is one of the very best I have ever seen and I've seen a lot in my time.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cute but broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: So cute but my daughter got this for Christmas and it didn’t even last 2 months. I thought it just needed a battery change, but it’s broken. She’s very sad because she loved it - it really is so cute but didn’t last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and silly (big hit at shower!)
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and it’s very cute. Bought for my niece’s baby shower and also bought her an accompanying Gund Baby stuffed Elephant (precious!) so baby has a toy to cuddle with after listening and playing with this! This toy has inner workings so cannot be cuddled with in bed. But the body is soft on the outside as are the ears! Oh, and it spoke English, not French! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Peek-A-Boo elephant is SOO soft and adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the sweetest gift. There is a push button feature in his foot. The voice is soft and natural, not computer generated or sounding. The ears actually flop and play peek-a-boo to the delight of our little one. He was captivated and snuggled with him after playing. When we got baby food on his body, it wiped clean with ease. Don’t ask me how it happened, there was an infant involved. :) This is the same plush animal sold at larger retail stores for double the price. Amazon does it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Flappy
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love Flappy. Flappy has kept our child entertained since he was 3 weeks old. I love his singing voice and he is easy to clean. All you need is to wipe him down with a wet one or a damp rag. Has a pretty good battery life too. We have played him on repeat at least 10 times a day since our baby was a newborn and the battery has just started to give out after almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Tereza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift for any baby or Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these they are absolutely adorable two are for my grandchildren I seriously couldn’t stop playing with them but had to make myself stop so I didn’t wear out the batteries before the kids got time for Christmas. They are very soft. Although one of them came not in a package like the other two, it did not appear to be dirty nor did it have a smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves him ❤️❤️❤️ !!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 18 month old granddaughter! As soon as she opened it up she was totally enchanted with watching him sing, talk, and clap !! She had him keep talking and singing over and over ! Now she puts him in her stroller and pushes him around, so adorable !!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Our 14 month old granddaughter loves this elephant. She enjoys the songs, the floppy ears and easy for her tiny hands to start the music. Similar products that she has are difficult for her to activate at this age so we are happy that stuffed toy has an easy to activate device. A bit on the expensive side but Gund makes quality products and we think it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: This product is perfect for an infant!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 month old grandson. As soon as it was unwrapped and turned on, he was crazy about it. It is so cute the way its ears flip and cover the eyes and really does play peek-a-boo. I can't get over how long it kept him entertained. He was giggling away as the song would play. He had just really learned to giggle and this had him going on and on. I believe it's his favorite toy and anyone who is with him when he's playing with it just laughs and laughs too. It exceeded my expectations by a lot. This will not disappoint and will put a smile on your face :)
customer_reviews.author: robbiev

customer_reviews.title: Never used it, didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February for my first grandchild that was due in September. She was born September 5. The elephant sat in a closet until now. The ears flap but no sound at all. Past return window so I’m out the money. Even with new batteries...so disappointed. It was really cute.
customer_reviews.author: MindNumbDumplin

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this elephant. Was a gift for a one year old who has already figured out how to turn the song on and off. Although it was for a one year old, almost every adult who has seen it, could not help but to smile. Between the ears and the song, it’s just utterly charming. It’s soft and hard to resist for cuddles and hugs. It’s a perfect gift for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: V.konopacki

customer_reviews.title: Check if it works right away if not using for a little while!
customer_reviews.text: Saw it in the store and ordered on Amazon. It arrived before our daughter was old enough to play with it so we didn't pull out the tab to activate it for a couple months. When we did the voice works fine but the ears don't move at all. Wish I would have checked right away so it was soon enough after purchase to return.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur F
